content: Mount Mei is the secret area in Chapter 3 - White Snow, Ice Cold of Black Myth: Wukong. However, you'll only be able to access it in Chapter 5 after completing all the secret areas in the game. We'd recommend waiting until you've finished Chapter 6 of the game and beat it before you visit Mount Mei, due to it being a vital place to see for the secret ending of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
Mount Mei is the secret area in Chapter 3 - White Snow, Ice Cold of Black Myth: Wukong. However, you'll only be able to access it in Chapter 5 after completing all the secret areas in the game. We'd recommend waiting until you've finished Chapter 6 of the game and beat it before you visit Mount Mei, due to it being a vital place to see for the secret ending of the game.
